import{_ as u}from"./CardForm-5ad2b621.js";import{m as o,u as i,o as t,b as c,w as f,c as p,d as l,e as d,f as g,a as V,g as _,D as w}from"./index-aee75141.js";const x={key:0,class:"inline-flex gap-1.5 text-base mb-5 text-gray-700"},B={__name:"AddCardModal",props:o({showMessage:{type:Boolean,default:!1}},{modelValue:{},modelModifiers:{}}),emits:o(["success"],["update:modelValue"]),setup(s,{emit:n}){const m=n,a=i(s,"modelValue");return(M,e)=>(t(),c(d(w),{modelValue:a.value,"onUpdate:modelValue":e[1]||(e[1]=r=>a.value=r),options:{title:"Add new card"}},{"body-content":f(()=>[s.showMessage?(t(),p("div",x,[l(d(g),{class:"h-4",name:"info"}),e[2]||(e[2]=V("span",null," Add at least one card before changing the payment mode. ",-1))])):_("",!0),l(u,{onSuccess:e[0]||(e[0]=()=>{a.value=!1,m("success")})})]),_:1},8,["modelValue"]))}};export{B as _};
